uuid.name: uuid
uuid.help: Universally Unique Identifier (UUID; automatically assigned but can be manually reset).

options.name: accept
options.help: Allows session that match the firewall policy.

options.name: deny
options.help: Blocks sessions that match the firewall policy.

options.name: ipsec
options.help: Firewall policy becomes a policy-based IPsec VPN policy.

srcaddr.name: srcaddr
srcaddr.help: Source IPv4 address and address group names.

dstaddr.name: dstaddr
dstaddr.help: Destination IPv4 address and address group names.

srcaddr6.name: srcaddr6
srcaddr6.help: Source IPv6 address name and address group names.

dstaddr6.name: dstaddr6
dstaddr6.help: Destination IPv6 address name and address group names.

options.name: or
options.help: Match ZTNA tags using a logical OR operator.

options.name: and
options.help: Match ZTNA tags using a logical AND operator.

internet-service.name: internet-service
internet-service.help: Enable/disable use of Internet Services for this policy. If enabled, destination address and service are not used.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable use of Internet Services in policy.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable use of Internet Services in policy.

internet-service-src.name: internet-service-src
internet-service-src.help: Enable/disable use of Internet Services in source for this policy. If enabled, source address is not used.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable use of Internet Services source in policy.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable use of Internet Services source in policy.

internet-service-src-custom-group.name: internet-service-src-custom-group
internet-service-src-custom-group.help: Custom Internet Service source group name.

reputation-direction.name: reputation-direction
reputation-direction.help: Direction of the initial traffic for reputation to take effect.

internet-service6.name: internet-service6
internet-service6.help: Enable/disable use of IPv6 Internet Services for this policy. If enabled, destination address and service are not used.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable use of IPv6 Internet Services in policy.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable use of IPv6 Internet Services in policy.

internet-service6-src.name: internet-service6-src
internet-service6-src.help: Enable/disable use of IPv6 Internet Services in source for this policy. If enabled, source address is not used.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable use of IPv6 Internet Services source in policy.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable use of IPv6 Internet Services source in policy.

internet-service6-src-custom.name: internet-service6-src-custom
internet-service6-src-custom.help: Custom IPv6 Internet Service source name.

internet-service6-src-custom-group.name: internet-service6-src-custom-group
internet-service6-src-custom-group.help: Custom Internet Service6 source group name.

reputation-minimum6.name: reputation-minimum6
reputation-minimum6.help: IPv6 Minimum Reputation to take action.

reputation-direction6.name: reputation-direction6
reputation-direction6.help: Direction of the initial traffic for IPv6 reputation to take effect.

options.name: source
options.help: Check reputation for IPv6 source address.

options.name: destination
options.help: Check reputation for IPv6 destination address.

rtp-addr.name: rtp-addr
rtp-addr.help: Address names if this is an RTP NAT policy.

send-deny-packet.name: send-deny-packet
send-deny-packet.help: Enable to send a reply when a session is denied or blocked by a firewall policy.

firewall-session-dirty.name: firewall-session-dirty
firewall-session-dirty.help: How to handle sessions if the configuration of this firewall policy changes.

options.name: check-all
options.help: Flush all current sessions accepted by this policy. These sessions must be started and re-matched with policies.

options.name: check-new
options.help: Continue to allow sessions already accepted by this policy.

schedule-timeout.name: schedule-timeout
schedule-timeout.help: Enable to force current sessions to end when the schedule object times out. Disable allows them to end from inactivity.

policy-expiry-date-utc.name: policy-expiry-date-utc
policy-expiry-date-utc.help: Policy expiry date and time, in epoch format.

tos-mask.name: tos-mask
tos-mask.help: Non-zero bit positions are used for comparison while zero bit positions are ignored.

tos.name: tos
tos.help: ToS (Type of Service) value used for comparison.

tcp-session-without-syn.name: tcp-session-without-syn
tcp-session-without-syn.help: Enable/disable creation of TCP session without SYN flag.

geoip-anycast.name: geoip-anycast
geoip-anycast.help: Enable/disable recognition of anycast IP addresses using the geography IP database.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable recognition of anycast IP addresses using the geography IP database.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable recognition of anycast IP addresses using the geography IP database.

geoip-match.name: geoip-match
geoip-match.help: Match geography address based either on its physical location or registered location.

options.name: physical-location
options.help: Match geography address to its physical location using the geography IP database.

options.name: registered-location
options.help: Match geography address to its registered location using the geography IP database.

dynamic-shaping.name: dynamic-shaping
dynamic-shaping.help: Enable/disable dynamic RADIUS defined traffic shaping.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable dynamic RADIUS defined traffic shaping.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable dynamic RADIUS defined traffic shaping.

passive-wan-health-measurement.name: passive-wan-health-measurement
passive-wan-health-measurement.help: Enable/disable passive WAN health measurement. When enabled, auto-asic-offload is disabled.

app-monitor.name: app-monitor
app-monitor.help: Enable/disable application TCP metrics in session logs.When enabled, auto-asic-offload is disabled.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable TCP metrics in session logs.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable TCP metrics in session logs.

utm-status.name: utm-status
utm-status.help: Enable to add one or more security profiles (AV, IPS, etc.) to the firewall policy.

inspection-mode.name: inspection-mode
inspection-mode.help: Policy inspection mode (Flow/proxy). Default is Flow mode.

http-policy-redirect.name: http-policy-redirect
http-policy-redirect.help: Redirect HTTP(S) traffic to matching transparent web proxy policy.

options.name: legacy
options.help: Enable HTTP(S) policy redirect (for preserving old behavior, not recommended for new setups).

ssh-policy-redirect.name: ssh-policy-redirect
ssh-policy-redirect.help: Redirect SSH traffic to matching transparent proxy policy.

ztna-policy-redirect.name: ztna-policy-redirect
ztna-policy-redirect.help: Redirect ZTNA traffic to matching Access-Proxy proxy-policy.

profile-type.name: profile-type
profile-type.help: Determine whether the firewall policy allows security profile groups or single profiles only.

options.name: single
options.help: Do not allow security profile groups.

profile-protocol-options.name: profile-protocol-options
profile-protocol-options.help: Name of an existing Protocol options profile.

ssl-ssh-profile.name: ssl-ssh-profile
ssl-ssh-profile.help: Name of an existing SSL SSH profile.

av-profile.name: av-profile
av-profile.help: Name of an existing Antivirus profile.

webfilter-profile.name: webfilter-profile
webfilter-profile.help: Name of an existing Web filter profile.

dnsfilter-profile.name: dnsfilter-profile
dnsfilter-profile.help: Name of an existing DNS filter profile.

emailfilter-profile.name: emailfilter-profile
emailfilter-profile.help: Name of an existing email filter profile.

dlp-profile.name: dlp-profile
dlp-profile.help: Name of an existing DLP profile.

file-filter-profile.name: file-filter-profile
file-filter-profile.help: Name of an existing file-filter profile.

ips-sensor.name: ips-sensor
ips-sensor.help: Name of an existing IPS sensor.

application-list.name: application-list
application-list.help: Name of an existing Application list.

voip-profile.name: voip-profile
voip-profile.help: Name of an existing VoIP (voipd) profile.

ips-voip-filter.name: ips-voip-filter
ips-voip-filter.help: Name of an existing VoIP (ips) profile.

sctp-filter-profile.name: sctp-filter-profile
sctp-filter-profile.help: Name of an existing SCTP filter profile.

diameter-filter-profile.name: diameter-filter-profile
diameter-filter-profile.help: Name of an existing Diameter filter profile.

virtual-patch-profile.name: virtual-patch-profile
virtual-patch-profile.help: Name of an existing virtual-patch profile.

icap-profile.name: icap-profile
icap-profile.help: Name of an existing ICAP profile.

videofilter-profile.name: videofilter-profile
videofilter-profile.help: Name of an existing VideoFilter profile.

waf-profile.name: waf-profile
waf-profile.help: Name of an existing Web application firewall profile.

ssh-filter-profile.name: ssh-filter-profile
ssh-filter-profile.help: Name of an existing SSH filter profile.

casb-profile.name: casb-profile
casb-profile.help: Name of an existing CASB profile.

logtraffic.name: logtraffic
logtraffic.help: Enable or disable logging. Log all sessions or security profile sessions.

options.name: all
options.help: Log all sessions accepted or denied by this policy.

options.name: utm
options.help: Log traffic that has a security profile applied to it.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable all logging for this policy.

logtraffic-start.name: logtraffic-start
logtraffic-start.help: Record logs when a session starts.

permit-any-host.name: permit-any-host
permit-any-host.help: Accept UDP packets from any host.

permit-stun-host.name: permit-stun-host
permit-stun-host.help: Accept UDP packets from any Session Traversal Utilities for NAT (STUN) host.

fixedport.name: fixedport
fixedport.help: Enable to prevent source NAT from changing a session's source port.

port-preserve.name: port-preserve
port-preserve.help: Enable/disable preservation of the original source port from source NAT if it has not been used.

options.name: enable
options.help: Use the original source port if it has not been used.

options.name: disable
options.help: Source NAT always changes the source port.

port-random.name: port-random
port-random.help: Enable/disable random source port selection for source NAT.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable random source port selection for source NAT.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable random source port selection for source NAT.

ippool.name: ippool
ippool.help: Enable to use IP Pools for source NAT.

session-ttl.name: session-ttl
session-ttl.help: TTL in seconds for sessions accepted by this policy (0 means use the system default session TTL).

vlan-cos-fwd.name: vlan-cos-fwd
vlan-cos-fwd.help: VLAN forward direction user priority: 255 passthrough, 0 lowest, 7 highest.

vlan-cos-rev.name: vlan-cos-rev
vlan-cos-rev.help: VLAN reverse direction user priority: 255 passthrough, 0 lowest, 7 highest.

inbound.name: inbound
inbound.help: Policy-based IPsec VPN: only traffic from the remote network can initiate a VPN.

outbound.name: outbound
outbound.help: Policy-based IPsec VPN: only traffic from the internal network can initiate a VPN.

natinbound.name: natinbound
natinbound.help: Policy-based IPsec VPN: apply destination NAT to inbound traffic.

natoutbound.name: natoutbound
natoutbound.help: Policy-based IPsec VPN: apply source NAT to outbound traffic.

fec.name: fec
fec.help: Enable/disable Forward Error Correction on traffic matching this policy on a FEC device.

wccp.name: wccp
wccp.help: Enable/disable forwarding traffic matching this policy to a configured WCCP server.

fsso-agent-for-ntlm.name: fsso-agent-for-ntlm
fsso-agent-for-ntlm.help: FSSO agent to use for NTLM authentication.

groups.name: groups
groups.help: Names of user groups that can authenticate with this policy.

users.name: users
users.help: Names of individual users that can authenticate with this policy.

name.name: name
name.help: Names of individual users that can authenticate with this policy.

vpntunnel.name: vpntunnel
vpntunnel.help: Policy-based IPsec VPN: name of the IPsec VPN Phase 1.

natip.name: natip
natip.help: Policy-based IPsec VPN: source NAT IP address for outgoing traffic.

match-vip.name: match-vip
match-vip.help: Enable to match packets that have had their destination addresses changed by a VIP.

match-vip-only.name: match-vip-only
match-vip-only.help: Enable/disable matching of only those packets that have had their destination addresses changed by a VIP.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable matching of only those packets that have had their destination addresses changed by a VIP.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable matching of only those packets that have had their destination addresses changed by a VIP.

diffserv-copy.name: diffserv-copy
diffserv-copy.help: Enable to copy packet's DiffServ values from session's original direction to its reply direction.

diffserv-forward.name: diffserv-forward
diffserv-forward.help: Enable to change packet's DiffServ values to the specified diffservcode-forward value.

diffserv-reverse.name: diffserv-reverse
diffserv-reverse.help: Enable to change packet's reverse (reply) DiffServ values to the specified diffservcode-rev value.

diffservcode-forward.name: diffservcode-forward
diffservcode-forward.help: Change packet's DiffServ to this value.

diffservcode-rev.name: diffservcode-rev
diffservcode-rev.help: Change packet's reverse (reply) DiffServ to this value.

auth-cert.name: auth-cert
auth-cert.help: HTTPS server certificate for policy authentication.

auth-redirect-addr.name: auth-redirect-addr
auth-redirect-addr.help: HTTP-to-HTTPS redirect address for firewall authentication.

redirect-url.name: redirect-url
redirect-url.help: URL users are directed to after seeing and accepting the disclaimer or authenticating.

custom-log-fields.name: custom-log-fields
custom-log-fields.help: Custom fields to append to log messages for this policy.

replacemsg-override-group.name: replacemsg-override-group
replacemsg-override-group.help: Override the default replacement message group for this policy.

srcaddr-negate.name: srcaddr-negate
srcaddr-negate.help: When enabled srcaddr specifies what the source address must NOT be.

srcaddr6-negate.name: srcaddr6-negate
srcaddr6-negate.help: When enabled srcaddr6 specifies what the source address must NOT be.

dstaddr-negate.name: dstaddr-negate
dstaddr-negate.help: When enabled dstaddr specifies what the destination address must NOT be.

dstaddr6-negate.name: dstaddr6-negate
dstaddr6-negate.help: When enabled dstaddr6 specifies what the destination address must NOT be.

ztna-ems-tag-negate.name: ztna-ems-tag-negate
ztna-ems-tag-negate.help: When enabled ztna-ems-tag specifies what the tags must NOT be.

service-negate.name: service-negate
service-negate.help: When enabled service specifies what the service must NOT be.

internet-service-negate.name: internet-service-negate
internet-service-negate.help: When enabled internet-service specifies what the service must NOT be.

internet-service-src-negate.name: internet-service-src-negate
internet-service-src-negate.help: When enabled internet-service-src specifies what the service must NOT be.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable negated Internet Service source match.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable negated Internet Service source match.

internet-service6-negate.name: internet-service6-negate
internet-service6-negate.help: When enabled internet-service6 specifies what the service must NOT be.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable negated IPv6 Internet Service match.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable negated IPv6 Internet Service match.

internet-service6-src-negate.name: internet-service6-src-negate
internet-service6-src-negate.help: When enabled internet-service6-src specifies what the service must NOT be.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable negated IPv6 Internet Service source match.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable negated IPv6 Internet Service source match.

timeout-send-rst.name: timeout-send-rst
timeout-send-rst.help: Enable/disable sending RST packets when TCP sessions expire.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable sending of RST packet upon TCP session expiration.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable sending of RST packet upon TCP session expiration.

captive-portal-exempt.name: captive-portal-exempt
captive-portal-exempt.help: Enable to exempt some users from the captive portal.

dsri.name: dsri
dsri.help: Enable DSRI to ignore HTTP server responses.

radius-mac-auth-bypass.name: radius-mac-auth-bypass
radius-mac-auth-bypass.help: Enable MAC authentication bypass. The bypassed MAC address must be received from RADIUS server.

radius-ip-auth-bypass.name: radius-ip-auth-bypass
radius-ip-auth-bypass.help: Enable IP authentication bypass. The bypassed IP address must be received from RADIUS server.

delay-tcp-npu-session.name: delay-tcp-npu-session
delay-tcp-npu-session.help: Enable TCP NPU session delay to guarantee packet order of 3-way handshake.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable TCP NPU session delay in order to guarantee packet order of 3-way handshake.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable TCP NPU session delay in order to guarantee packet order of 3-way handshake.

internet-service6-src-fortiguard.name: internet-service6-src-fortiguard
internet-service6-src-fortiguard.help: FortiGuard IPv6 Internet Service source name.
